brand_canonical_facts.founded_context: Founded in 2004 (as Facebook) in Cambridge, Massachusetts, originally built to connect people through an online social network; later reorganized and rebranded the parent company as Meta to unify its apps and technologies under a new company brand (announced at Connect 2021).
brand_canonical_facts.declared_positioning: A social technology company focused on building the future of human connection and the technology that makes it possible, spanning apps, AI, and mixed reality (AR/VR).
brand_canonical_facts.official_mission: To build the future of human connection and the technology that makes it possible.
brand_canonical_facts.official_vision: To bring the metaverse to life and help people connect, find communities and grow businesses.

brand_behavior_inference_ready_for_templ.usage_note: This section is structured as a neutral, pipeline-ready behavior model that can be mapped into your provided Brand Behavior JSON template without changing your template keys.

core_visual_dna: Future-facing human connection narrative anchored in everyday moments
Tech optimism communicated via approachable, warm storytelling rather than cold futurism
Metaverse and mixed reality framed as an extension of real life (bridging physical and digital presence)

photography_and_cinematography.dominant_style: Narrative lifestyle realism with premium commercial finish; occasional surreal/metaphorical inserts for metaverse transition beats
photography_and_cinematography.camera_language: Human-scale perspectives; conversational framing; clear subject readability; controlled depth; restrained lens effects
photography_and_cinematography.motion_language: Soft, natural movement; experiential POV inserts when demonstrating immersion or capture

color_contrast_light.palette_tendency: Balanced neutrals with selective saturated accents tied to product UI/brand gradients; warm skin tone priority
color_contrast_light.contrast_behavior: Medium contrast with clean highlight management; modern digital crispness; minimal heavy grain
color_contrast_light.lighting_behavior: Soft daylight or gently shaped practicals; high legibility; emphasis on comfort and clarity

composition_rules: High subject legibility, generous negative space in corporate contexts
Brand marks/locks appear with restrained scale and clean margins
Preference for clean, modern, system-driven UI typography in product-forward assets
layout_and_typography_behavior.logo_subject_relationship: Brand identity is typically secondary to the human moment or product utility; logo supports rather than dominates
layout_and_typography_behavior.cta_behavior: Direct, action-oriented CTAs in product moments; minimalistic when corporate narrative leads

casting_rules: Emphasis on authentic expressions, practical actions (sharing, exploring, learning, capturing)
casting_pose_physicality.pose_energy: Natural, candid, task-driven; low performative posing unless celebrity-led broadcast moment
